"Text message" widget
The "Text message" widget allows displaying the required text for user, including hyperlinks. Unlike the
"Text" Widget
, the text message is not limited to one line and has more complex text settings.
Widget example:
Widget setup
To create a widget, go to the "Widgets", tab, select "Text message" and drag it to the workspace. To configure the widget, you need to fill in the profile parameters:
Thereâ€™s a value corresponding to each setting:
Setting
Purpose
Open hyperlinks
Specifies how to open hyperlinks contained in the message template. Possible values:
in this window;
in a modal window;
in a new window.
Message template
Selecting a message template created earlier. The message template is represented by the
"Text message template" [SYS_TEMPLATE_TEXT_MSG]
type. Considered here below.
Creating a message template
To create a message template:
1. Go to the
"Text message template" [SYS_TEMPLATE_TEXT_MSG]
type registry. Learn more about
working with registries
.
2. Create a type instance using the
. button. The system will display the profile.
3. Generate the required message. The tools for working with text are standard and are located in the control panel of the notification template. You can set the text format, font and size (18 by default), color, alignment and indents, add a bulleted or numbered list, and insert an image, video or table.
4. Save the settings you have made. The configured widget will display the formatted text in the profile.
